article_title: EJC Business Review: Medicaid expansion in Missouri would add hospital jobs

article_metadata.description: By Jeff Foxjeff.fox@examiner.net Jobs in health care are projected to continue to rise in Missouri and elsewhere. Advocates say expanding the state’s Medicaid program, as endorsed by Gov. Jay Nixon, would add even more.The General Assembly has refused to take up the issue, and that doesn’t appear likely to change soon.“I think it’s a really tough political question for the General Assembly to solve,” said Charlie Shields, CEO of Truman Medical Centers and
